subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Related to {{cog|cdm|धय्‌सा||to concentrate; look at (especially when aiming)|tr=dhəy-}}, {{m|cdm|धेस्‌सा||to see clearly; to sight clearly (when aiming)|tr=dhes-}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

Also compare {{cog|vi|thấy||to see, to look, to find, to feel}}.
